title: Update image paths to use absolute urls
Refactor CONNECT session handling and add tests
body:
## Summary
- restructure the CONNECT handshake into staged session types to avoid interior `Option` state and make early exits explicit
- keep queue cleanup and actor spawning in the appropriate stage while preserving existing scheduler interactions
- add async tests that cover 405, 505, 502, and 503 responses from the CONNECT handler, including capacity failures

## Testing
- cargo test http::connect::tests::returns_405_for_non_connect_method
- cargo test http::connect::tests::returns_505_for_unsupported_http_version
- cargo test http::connect::tests::returns_502_when_backend_connection_fails
- cargo test http::connect::tests::returns_503_when_scheduler_is_at_capacity

------
[Codex Task](https://chatgpt.com/codex/tasks/task_e_69188f83af608322933b86fb250b0189)

title: Add test covering scheduler unregister state handling
body:
## Summary
- expose a test-only InspectState message so tests can read scheduler internals
- add a unit test that exercises unregister to verify connection counts and rr_index maintenance

## Testing
- cargo test scheduler::tests::unregister_updates_connection_count_and_rr_index

title: Polish scheduler logging conditions and rate unit tests
Refactor CONNECT proxy flow management into session object
body:
## Summary
- encapsulate CONNECT handshake state inside a new `ConnectSession` helper
- move request validation, backend connection, registration, and finalization logic into focused methods
- streamline `handle_connect_proxy` to follow the high-level CONNECT flow

## Testing
- cargo fmt
- cargo check

title: Refactor scheduler dequeue handling
body:

- split the scheduler round robin loop so that dequeue requests are sent via a helper
- move dequeue response handling, statistics updates, and backend writes into dedicated methods for readability

## Testing

title: Add CLI options for port and max connections
body:
## Summary
- add Clap dependency and derive-based CLI parser for configuring the proxy port and connection limit
- expose run defaults and accept runtime parameters so the server uses the parsed values

## Testing
- cargo fmt
- cargo check *(fails: unable to download crates index due to 403 CONNECT tunnel error)*

title: Refactor CONNECT proxy handling into helpers
body:
